newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was moderate late Thursday. Slaughter steers and heifers closed steady. Inquiry and demand was moderate. Sales confirmed on 5,600 slaughter steers and 1,400 slaughter heifers. For the week to date 97,600 head including 20,800 head or about 21 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Steers - select and choice 2-3 1125-1250 lbs 69.00, load
Heifers - select and choice 2-3 975-1100 lbs 69.00, load
week to date: 97600 last week: 104900 last year: 68200
